name: CC Game Engine (v5.7)
description:
The latest version I have of the current CC Engine I developed.

This tech demo showcases updated sprites of the character from my demo game a slightly polished platformer movement engine based off of Mega Man Zero, or Mega Man ZX.

I don't think I will be able to update or work on this game engine because I want to move onto using Unity instead of GMS2 and that I don't have enough time in general for coding.
